entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Nordegg
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:43 AM MST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 18.
